title: Defining Low Data Loss, Downtime Tolerances in Kubernetes
author: Janet Wi
description: It’s vital not only to define recovery point objective (RPO) and recovery time objective (RTO) tolerances, but to build an environment that can support your strictest SLAs.
cntitle: 定义 Kubernetes 中低数据丢失、停机容限
cndescription: 定义恢复点目标 (RPO) 和恢复时间目标 (RTO) 容限至关重要，但更重要的是构建一个能够支持您最严格 SLA 的环境。
